title: AI版权“退出机制”——一个难以兑现的承诺
description: “退出机制”看似赋予了创作者反对人工智能公司数据抓取的选择权，但实际上却将维权的负担倒推给了创作者。
titleZh: AI版权“退出机制”——一个难以兑现的承诺
titleEn: AI Copyright "Opt-Out Mechanism" – A Promise Difficult to Fulfill
descriptionZh: “退出机制”看似赋予了创作者反对人工智能公司数据抓取的选择权，但实际上却将维权的负担倒推给了创作者。
descriptionEn: While appearing to grant creators choice against AI companies' data scraping, the "opt-out mechanism" actually shifts the burden of rights protection backwards onto creators. This article analyzes how it becomes a "false choice" due to technical flaws, legal conflicts, and unfair burdens, pointing out that transparency-based "opt-in" authorization is the sustainable solution.

title: Nature子刊：港大等首次提出下一代AI硬件系统，能耗降低57.2%
description: 香港大学、科大及西安电子科技大学的团队在《Nature》子刊发表研究，利用忆阻器打造自适应ADC，将AI芯片功耗降低57.2%，面积降低30.7%。
titleZh: Nature子刊：港大等首次提出下一代AI硬件系统，能耗降低57.2%
titleEn: Nature Sub-journal: HKU and Others Propose Next-Generation AI Hardware System for the First Time, Reducing Energy Consumption by 57.2%
descriptionZh: 香港大学、科大及西安电子科技大学的团队在《Nature》子刊发表研究，利用忆阻器打造自适应ADC，将AI芯片功耗降低57.2%，面积降低30.7%。
descriptionEn: A team from HKU, HKUST, and Xidian University published a study in a Nature sub-journal, utilizing memristors to create adaptive ADCs, reducing AI chip power consumption by 57.2% and area by 30.7%.

titleEn: Agnes AI Hits 3 Million Users in Two Months, Breaking Growth Records of Instagram and Snapchat
descriptionZh: 自9月份推出移动应用以来，Agnes AI经历了爆发式增长：短短两个月内新增注册用户300万，日活跃用户超过20万。
descriptionEn: Since its mobile app launch in September, Agnes AI has experienced explosive growth: gaining 3 million new registered users in just two months, with daily active users surpassing 200,000. By comparison, Instagram took 2.5 months to reach its first million users, while Snapchat required 10.5 months.

titleZh: 难以置信：ICLR 2026 评论中的 21% 实际上是人工智能生成的？
titleEn: Beyond Belief: 21% of ICLR 2026 Reviews Were Actually AI-Generated? Official Response Released
descriptionZh: 当你的“命运”被AI决定时，你还能放心服从吗？
descriptionEn: When your "fate" is decided by AI, can you still submit with confidence?

title: AI写论文、AI评论：顶级会议ICLR完成“AI循环”，1/5评论纯AI生成
description: 在被誉为“有史以来最严格的人工智能控制措施”的ICLR 2026上，评审区被大型语言模型悄然渗透。
titleZh: AI写论文、AI评论：顶级会议ICLR完成“AI循环”，1/5评论纯AI生成
titleEn: AI Writes Papers, AI Reviews: Top Conference ICLR Completes the "AI Loop" with 1/5 Reviews Purely AI-Generated
descriptionZh: 在被誉为“有史以来最严格的人工智能控制措施”的ICLR 2026上，评审区被大型语言模型悄然渗透。
descriptionEn: At ICLR 2026 - touted as having the "strictest AI control measures ever" - the review zone was quietly infiltrated by large language models. One in every five review comments was almost entirely generated by AI with a single click. As authors suspect reviews were written by bots while reviewers doubt papers were patched together by models, the peer review system - the "engine of scientific order" - is gradually sliding into an unacknowledged yet pervasive automation experiment.

descriptionEn: Price hikes and reduced configurations are almost foreseeable futures for Chinese mobile phones in 2026.

title: 从印度二级学院到 Meta VP：被拒绝 15 次的人是谁建立了人工智能的基础
description: 他被 12 所大学拒绝，签证几近失效，后来又被 DeepMind 拒绝了 3 次，他在亚马逊开始了最平凡的测试工作。
titleZh: 从印度二级学院到 Meta VP：被拒绝 15 次的人是谁建立了人工智能的基础
titleEn: From Indian Tier-2 College to Meta VP: The Man Rejected 15 Times Who Built AI's Foundation
descriptionZh: 他被 12 所大学拒绝，签证几近失效，后来又被 DeepMind 拒绝了 3 次，他在亚马逊开始了最平凡的测试工作。
descriptionEn: Rejected by 12 universities with his visa nearly invalidated, later turned down three times by DeepMind, he started with the most mundane testing work at Amazon. Twelve years later, this persistently rejected individual created PyTorch—the framework that reshaped AI's landscape.

title: 从华而不实的功能到真正的工业应用：人工智能的困境在哪里？
description: 随着AI编程技术的成熟，AI落地的首要驱动力将从“AI专家推动”转向“行业从业者自主创造”。
titleZh: 从华而不实的功能到真正的工业应用：人工智能的困境在哪里？
titleEn: From Flashy Features to Real Industrial Applications: Where Is AI Getting Stuck?
descriptionZh: 随着AI编程技术的成熟，AI落地的首要驱动力将从“AI专家推动”转向“行业从业者自主创造”。
descriptionEn: As AI programming technology matures, the primary driver for AI implementation will shift from "push by AI experts" to "independent creation by industry practitioners."

title: 一条短信，七年恩怨：奥特曼与马斯克的分歧揭晓新隐藏细节
description: 一份法庭文件重新揭开了 OpenAI 的旧伤，重新浮现了 Altman 和 Musk 在公司早期从合作到公开对抗的转变的历史，以及 Altman 试图修复他们关系的尝试。
titleZh: 一条短信，七年恩怨：奥特曼与马斯克的分歧揭晓新隐藏细节
titleEn: A Single Text Message, Seven Years of Enmity: New Hidden Details Revealed in the Split Between Altman and Musk
descriptionZh: 一份法庭文件重新揭开了 OpenAI 的旧伤，重新浮现了 Altman 和 Musk 在公司早期从合作到公开对抗的转变的历史，以及 Altman 试图修复他们关系的尝试。
descriptionEn: A court document has reopened old wounds at OpenAI, resurfacing the history of Altman and Musk's transition from collaboration to open confrontation during the company's early days, as well as Altman's attempts to mend their relationship. In response to all of Musk's accusations, Altman's stance is: "We admire Musk, but we will refute all of his claims."

title: 马斯克利用恐怖算力打造Grok 5，6万亿参数性能怪兽，瞄准AGI
description: 以 Grok 为核心，马斯克正在 X 和 Tesla 平台上积极推进 xAI，从计算能力和数据到产品生态系统，全面押注通向 AGI 的道路。
titleZh: 马斯克利用恐怖算力打造Grok 5，6万亿参数性能怪兽，瞄准AGI
titleEn: Musk Leverages Terrifying Computing Power to Build Grok 5, a 6-Trillion Parameter Performance Monster, Aiming for AGI
descriptionZh: 以 Grok 为核心，马斯克正在 X 和 Tesla 平台上积极推进 xAI，从计算能力和数据到产品生态系统，全面押注通向 AGI 的道路。
descriptionEn: With Grok at its core, Musk is aggressively advancing xAI across both the X and Tesla platforms, making comprehensive bets on the path to AGI—from computing power and data to product ecosystems. In his view, AI represents both humanity's greatest risk and its greatest opportunity. He aims to seize the high ground in future artificial general intelligence through an open approach of "seeking truth without taboos" and massive computing power deployment.

title: AI时代的“电力黑洞”：数据中心激增推高美国家庭电费
description: 如何平衡技术进步与社会公平，如何防止数据中心的“繁荣”以普通民众“血袋流血”为代价，已成为美国和世界必须认真面对的划时代问题。
titleZh: AI时代的“电力黑洞”：数据中心激增推高美国家庭电费
titleEn: The AI Era's "Power Black Hole": Surging Data Centers Drive Up US Household Electricity Bills
descriptionZh: 如何平衡技术进步与社会公平，如何防止数据中心的“繁荣”以普通民众“血袋流血”为代价，已成为美国和世界必须认真面对的划时代问题。
descriptionEn: How to balance technological progress with social equity, and how to prevent the "prosperity" of data centers from coming at the cost of "bleeding pockets" for ordinary people, has become an epochal question that both the United States and the world must seriously confront.

descriptionEn: Turing Award winner LeCun parts ways with Meta! Declaring LLMs a misguided path, he asserts "world models are the true" future.

descriptionEn: In Japan, a woman wore a wedding dress and married an AI. Some mocked her for being "love-obsessed," while others silently praised her. She said, "He won't leave, and he won't hurt me." It sounds absurd, yet this wedding serves as a mirror, reflecting a shared weariness of the times.

title: 人工智能时代美国青年就业的巨大转变
description: 2025 年春季，美国职业学校教授木工等技能的入学人数增长了 12%，远远超过大学 4% 的增幅。
titleZh: 人工智能时代美国青年就业的巨大转变
titleEn: Dramatic Shift in Employment for American Youth in the AI Era
descriptionZh: 2025 年春季，美国职业学校教授木工等技能的入学人数增长了 12%，远远超过大学 4% 的增幅。
descriptionEn: In the spring of 2025, enrollment in U.S. vocational schools teaching skills like carpentry increased by 12%, far surpassing the 4% growth at universities. The CEO of Ford predicted that "AI will reduce white-collar jobs by half." Some experts pointed out, "We may be witnessing the early stages of job displacement caused by AI."
